contentrichtext.text: {{Wiktionary|riptide}} A '''[[riptide]]''' is a dangerous ocean current. '''Riptide''' or '''Rip Tide''' may also refer to: {{TOC right}} ==Amusement rides== * [[Riptide (Canada's Wonderland)]], a Top Spin ride * Riptide, a pirate ship ride at [[Morey's Piers]] * Rip Tide, a Top Spin ride at [[Knott's Berry Farm]] ==Films and television== * [[Riptide (film)|''Riptide'' (film)]], by Edmund Goulding * [[Riptide (TV series)|''Riptide'' (TV series)]], a 1980s American detective series * [[Riptide (Australian TV series)|''Riptide'' (Australian TV series)]] (1969), starring Ty Hardin ==Literature== * ''[[Rip Tide]]'', a Doctor Who novella * [[Riptide (book series)|''Riptide'' (book series)]], short story anthologies * [[Riptide (comics)]], a character in the Marvel universe * [[Riptide (novel)|''Riptide'' (novel)]], by Douglas Preston and Lincoln Child ==Music== ;Albums * [[Riptide (album)|''Riptide'' (album)]], by Robert Palmer * ''[[The Rip Tide]]'' (2011), by Beirut ;Songs * "[[Riptide (song)|"Riptide" (song)]], by Sick Puppies on the album ''Tri-Polar'' ==Sport== *[[Central Jersey Riptide]], a soccer team from Clark, New Jersey *[[Los Angeles Riptide]], a lacrosse team from Carson, California *[[New England Riptide]], a women's softball team from Lowell, Massachusetts *[[Oregon Riptide]], a basketball team in Portland, Oregon *[[San Diego Riptide]], a football team in San Diego, California *Riptide, ringname of American professional wrestler [[Angel Orsini]] ==See also== *[[Dead Island: Riptide]], a video game {{Disambiguation}}
